hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select DISTINCT EWMP.EWMP_ID, EWMP.REC_STATUS, EWMP.ORG_ID, EWMP.EWMP_CODE, EWMP.CREATOR, EWMP.CREATE_TIME, EWMP.MODIFIER, EWMP.MODIFY_TIME, EWMP.REC_VER, EWMP.EWMP_NAME_EN, EWMP.EWMP_NAME, EWMP.EWMP_CUSTOMER_CODE, EWMP.EWMP_CUSTOMER_NAME, EWMP.EWMP_WORK_TYPE_CODE, EWMP.EWMP_WORK_TYPE_NAME, EWMP.EWMP_PRIORITY, EWMP.EWMP_EFFECT_SHIPPER_TIME_FM, EWMP.EWMP_EFFECT_SHIPPER_TIME_TO, EWMP.EWMP_EFFECT_CONSIGNEE_TIME_FM, EWMP.EWMP_EFFECT_CONSIGNEE_TIME_TO, EWMP.EWMP_REMARK from EO_WORK_MERGER_PARAM EWMP where 1=1 <<and EWMP.EWMP_CODE = :ewmpCode>> <<and EWMP.EWMP_NAME like :ewmpName>> <<and EWMP.EWMP_NAME_EN like :ewmpNameEn>> <<and EWMP.EWMP_CUSTOMER_CODE = :ewmpCustomerCode>> <<and EWMP.EWMP_WORK_TYPE_CODE = :ewmpWorkTypeCode>> <<and EWMP.EWMP_REMARK = :ewmpRemark >> <<and EWMP.REC_STATUS = :recStatus>> <<and EWMP.EWMP_PRIORITY = :ewmpPriority>> <<and EWMP.ORG_ID = :orgId>> order by EWMP.EWMP_ID desc
